pages.disclaimers: Horologix - Important Disclaimers and Legal Notices Horologix HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Disclaimers Accuracy of Information The information provided by Horologix on this website is for general informational purposes only. Any reliance you place on such information is therefore strictly at your own risk. Professional Advice The information provided by Horologix does not constitute professional advice. Any reliance you place on such information is strictly at your own risk. We recommend that you seek professional advice before making any decisions based on the information provided on this website. Limitation of Liability In no event will we be liable for any loss or damage including without limitation, indirect or consequential loss or damage, or any loss or damage whatsoever arising from loss of data or profits arising out of, or in connection with, the use of this website. External Links Through this website, you are able to link to other websites which are not under the control of Horologix. We have no control over the nature, content, and availability of those sites. The inclusion of any links does not necessarily imply a recommendation or endorse the views expressed within them. Changes We reserve the right to update or change our Disclaimers at any time without notice. By using this website, you agree to be bound by the current version of these Disclaimers. pages.privacy-policy: Horologix - Privacy Policy Horologix HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Privacy Policy Introduction At Horologix, we prioritize the privacy and security of our customers' personal information. This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your data when you use our website or interact with our services. We are committed to transparency and safeguarding your privacy every step of the way. Information We Collect We collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment details when you make a purchase or create an account on our website. We also collect non-personal information such as your IP address, browser type, and device information for analytical purposes. How We Use Your Information We may use your personal information to process orders, provide customer support, personalize your experience, and send promotional emails about new products or special offers. We may also use non-personal information for analytical purposes to improve our website and services. Information Sharing and Disclosure We may share your personal information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting business, or servicing you. However, we do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes. Data Security We implement various security measures to protect your personal information and maintain its confidentiality. These measures include encryption, firewalls, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. Changes to This Privacy Policy We reserve the right to update or change our privacy policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the date of the last update will be indicated at the top of the page. We encourage you to review this privacy policy periodically for any updates. The Horologix website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline Horologix > Disclaimers > Privacy & Policy > Terms & Conditions

pages.terms-conditions: Horologix - Terms and Conditions Horologix HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Terms and Conditions Introduction Please read these Terms and Conditions ("Terms", "Terms and Conditions") carefully before using the Horologix website (the "Service") operated by Horologix ("us", "we", or "our"). Your access to and use of the Service is conditioned on your acceptance of and compliance with these Terms. These Terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use the Service. Accounts When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate, complete, and current information at all times. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of your account on our Service. Intellectual Property The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Horologix and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws of both the United States and foreign countries. Links To Other Web Sites Our Service may contain links to third-party web sites or services that are not owned or controlled by Horologix. Horologix has no control over, and assumes no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party web sites or services. Changes We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion.
